name: Bargain Simulator 2021 (kinda incomplete)
description:
A game where you bargain with the shopkeeper by playing with their minds!

NOTE: THIS GAME IS NOT FULLY COMPLETE

Controls:
  • WASD - Move
  • Left Click - Take Items
  • E - talk with shopkeeper (only works when you are close enough to him)
Team:
  • Oxygencraft (programmer and artist)
  • Roboticol (programmer and artist aswell)
